languages.text: "Если не брать во внимание методы Чорда, она может обеспечить порядок, а он сейчас нужен станции больше регенераторов воздуха".
languages.translation_comment:
Footfall was given over to Chorda.
Jae: "Vladaym is no longer Liege of Footfall... Not that I feel sorry for the old weasel, but he did know how to keep the station under control. Will his replacement be able to handle such an unruly house?"

traits.locale_text: "Если не брать во внимание методы Чорда, она может обеспечить порядок, а он сейчас нужен станции больше регенераторов воздуха".

languages.text: "Chorda's methods aside, she can keep order on the station, and that is something Footfall needs more than air regenerators at this time."
languages.translation_comment:
Footfall was given over to Chorda.
Jae: "Vladaym is no longer Liege of Footfall... Not that I feel sorry for the old weasel, but he did know how to keep the station under control. Will his replacement be able to handle such an unruly house?"
languages.original_text: "Если не брать во внимание методы Чорда, она может обеспечить порядок, а он сейчас нужен станции больше регенераторов воздуха".

traits.locale_text: "Chorda's methods aside, she can keep order on the station, and that is something Footfall needs more than air regenerators at this time."
"Chorda's methods aside, she can keep order on the station, and that is something Footfall needs more than air regenerators at this time."

"Chorda's methods aside, she can keep order on the station, and that is something Footfall needs more than air regenerators at this time."

languages.text: 「チョーダのやり方はともかくとして、彼女にはこのステーションの秩序を保つ力がある。そして今のフットフォールにとっては、それは空気再生装置よりも重要なものだ」
languages.original_text: "Chorda's methods aside, she can keep order on the station, and that is something Footfall needs more than air regenerators at this time."

traits.locale_text: 「チョーダのやり方はともかくとして、彼女にはこのステーションの秩序を保つ力がある。そして今のフットフォールにとっては、それは空気再生装置よりも重要なものだ」

languages.text: "Chordas Methoden hin oder her, sie hat auf der Station die Ordnung gewahrt, und das braucht Footfall im Augenblick dringender als Luftregeneratoren."
languages.original_text: "Chorda's methods aside, she can keep order on the station, and that is something Footfall needs more than air regenerators at this time."

traits.locale_text: "Chordas Methoden hin oder her, sie hat auf der Station die Ordnung gewahrt, und das braucht Footfall im Augenblick dringender als Luftregeneratoren."

languages.text: « Je ne m'étendrai pas sur les méthodes de Chorda, mais il faut reconnaître qu'elle est capable de préserver l'ordre sur la station et c'est une chose dont Castel a grand besoin à l'heure actuelle, bien plus que de régénérateurs d'air. »
languages.original_text: "Chorda's methods aside, she can keep order on the station, and that is something Footfall needs more than air regenerators at this time."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne m'étendrai pas sur les méthodes de Chorda, mais il faut reconnaître qu'elle est capable de préserver l'ordre sur la station et c'est une chose dont Castel a grand besoin à l'heure actuelle, bien plus que de régénérateurs d'air. »

languages.text: «Dejando a un lado los métodos de Chorda, está claro que sabe mantener el orden en la estación, y ahora mismo eso es algo que Paso necesita más que recicladores de aire».
languages.original_text: "Chorda's methods aside, she can keep order on the station, and that is something Footfall needs more than air regenerators at this time."

traits.locale_text: «Dejando a un lado los métodos de Chorda, está claro que sabe mantener el orden en la estación, y ahora mismo eso es algo que Paso necesita más que recicladores de aire».

languages.text: “我们姑且不论库尔达的手段，她确实维持住了这座星站的秩序。对落脚港而言，秩序是比空气再生器更重要的东西。”
languages.original_text: "Chorda's methods aside, she can keep order on the station, and that is something Footfall needs more than air regenerators at this time."

traits.locale_text: “我们姑且不论库尔达的手段，她确实维持住了这座星站的秩序。对落脚港而言，秩序是比空气再生器更重要的东西。”

languages.text: "Metotlarını bir yana bırakırsak Chorda, istasyonu hizada tutabiliyor. Binliman'ın hava rejeneratörlerinden çok buna ihtiyacı var."
languages.original_text: "Chorda's methods aside, she can keep order on the station, and that is something Footfall needs more than air regenerators at this time."

traits.locale_text: "Metotlarını bir yana bırakırsak Chorda, istasyonu hizada tutabiliyor. Binliman'ın hava rejeneratörlerinden çok buna ihtiyacı var."

languages.original_text: "Chorda's methods aside, she can keep order on the station, and that is something Footfall needs more than air regenerators at this time."
